scripts.generate:openapi:ts: npm run generate:openapi && npx --yes openapi-typescript artifacts/openapi.json -o artifacts/openapi.d.ts
scripts.typecheck:contracts: npm run generate:openapi:ts && npx tsc --project tsconfig.contracts.json --noEmit
scripts.test:js: npm run generate:openapi && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules jest
